name: Whack a Santa
description:
Whack A Santa !

Here's this year's Christmas special :- Whack A Santa Claus, Whack A Snowman and Whack a Rudolph!

Its a fun game for all the family, test your reactions and finger control, see if you can whack more frozen snowmen then your little sister.

You only have one mallet in the arcades so simply mashing the screen with lots of fingers simply wont work. Each touch needs to be precise, on target, and lifted cleanly before the next finger goes down.

Have fun, we reckon anything over 40 is good, 70 is awesome. We're not sure if 100 is possible so let us know if you manage it.

Download "Whack a Santa" now, and have a Smashing Christmas!
